bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. I make honey for you all. What am I?

hints.text: 🟡 I am yellow and black.
🌻 I love flowers.
🍯 I make something sweet.

bug.question: I hop around and have long legs. I might eat the plants in your garden. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am green.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🌿 I like to eat leaves.

bug.question: I am a bug that is red with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am mostly red.
⚫ I have black dots on my back.
🐞 My name includes the word 'lady'.

bug.question: I build big hills and work together. I can be red or black. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🏠 I live underground.
🍎 I sometimes steal food at picnics.

bug.question: I float on the wind, and start as a caterpillar. I am very pretty and colorful. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I start as a worm.
🦋 I have big, colorful wings.
🌸 I like to drink nectar.

bug.question: I make a sticky web and have eight legs. I catch bugs for my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I spin a web.
🕷️ I have more legs than you.
🦟 I eat other bugs.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing bottom. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I shine in the dark.
✨ I am a beetle.
🌙 You often see me on summer nights.

bug.question: I can fly really fast and have big eyes. I eat mosquitos. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I like to live near water.
👀 I have excellent eyesight.
🦟 I eat annoying bugs.

bug.question: I am a bug that looks like a stick. I blend in with the trees so you can't see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like part of a tree.
🌿 I am long and thin.
🍃 I eat leaves.

bug.question: I live in the water when I am young and grow wings when I am older. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I start as an egg in the water.
🌱 I change a lot during my life.
🪰 I fly when I grow up.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys like me a lot! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love to eat me.
📏 I am long and curved.
💛 My peel is yellow.

food.question: I am round and juicy, and often red. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 You can make a pie out of me.
🍎 Snow White liked me, but not the poisoned one.
🔴 I can be red, green, or yellow.

food.question: I am white and you eat me with a spoon. I am made from milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from an animal.
🥣 I am often eaten for breakfast.
🍦 You can freeze me and add flavors.

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny's favourite snack!
👓 Eating me can help you see better.
🌱 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am a small, green vegetable that grows in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the same color as grass.
👨‍🌾 I grow on a vine.
🥣 You can eat me in soup.

food.question: I am made from potatoes and fried. You often eat me with ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can get me at a fast food restaurant.
🧂 People like to put salt on me.
🥔 I start as a root vegetable.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast and baked in an oven. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food in many countries.
🥪 You can put cheese and ham between two slices of me.
🌾 I'm often made from wheat.

food.question: I am made from tomatoes, cheese, and other toppings on a crust. You cut me into slices. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I come from Italy.
🍕 I'm often served in a box.
🍅 I use a red sauce as a base.

food.question: I am a sweet treat made from sugar, butter, and flour, and often have chocolate chips inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍪 I am often eaten with milk.
🔥 You bake me in an oven.
🍫 I often have chocolate in me.

food.question: I am a fruit that grows in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. You can make juice or raisins from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 Monkeys also like me, but not as much as bananas
🍷 You can make wine from me.
☀️ When I am dried, I become a raisin.
